Caption: Prof. B. Sengupto (Director) conversing with the guests at the Third Institute Day
Description: The Third Institute Day took place at the Instituteâ€™s Building Sciences Block on the IITM campus. The previous Institute Days were celebrated at the hostels and this was the first Institute Day to take place in the academic zone of the Institute. The chief guest for the event was Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications). The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. A number of guests were present at the event. Prizes were awarded to students, faculty members, alumni and others involved in the Institution. In the image Dr. B. Sengupto converses with one of the guests at the event while the rest of the guests wait for the event to begin
